description:
Arlong`s violent tendencies are condemned by Fisher Tiger, and the arrival of a young human girl teaches the Fish-Man Pirates a lesson in compassion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kizaru Appears! A Trap to Catch Tiger!
Kizaru Toujou! Tiger o Nerau Wana!
Kizaru entre en scène ! Le piège se referme sur Tiger !
黄猿登場! タイガーを狙う罠!
